      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private int[] EnemyController.aStar(Enemy myEnemy)
      Path finding algorithm for the high AI enemy, using a* search.
      private boolean EnemyController.bomberManInRangeHighAI(Enemy myEnemy)
      Checks whether or not enemy is in range of bomberman, which is within two cell movements.
      private boolean EnemyController.bomberManInRangeMedAI(Enemy myEnemy)
      Check whether or not the enemy is in range for medium AI, which is one block in up, down, left, and right directions.
      private boolean EnemyController.getObstacle(Cell cell, Enemy myEnemy)
      Checks whether or not the cell in question has an obstacle in relation to if enemy has wall pass.
      private void EnemyController.highAI(Enemy myEnemy)
      Automatically set the movement for a high AI enemy, depending on the different scenarios.
      private void EnemyController.medAI(Enemy myEnemy)
      Automatically set the movement direction of a medium AI enemy depending on different scenarios.
      private int EnemyController.medAIchase(Enemy myEnemy)
      Method that will return a direction that will chase bomberman for medium AI.
      void EnemyController.moveEnemy(Enemy enemy, boolean wallPass)
      This method takes care of the moving one enemy on the screen
